entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 4:58 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -32.5°C
Wind: S 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
